alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 1:28AM MDT until October 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 8 inches, except 4 to 14 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Stanley Basin and Sun Valley Region including but not limited to Clayton, Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times, especially over Galena Summit. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
